testcase.system-out: getLoggedInUserCartDetails SELECT C.id, C.productid, C.userid,C.quantity, P.productname, P.image, P.price FROM product P INNER JOIN cart C ON C.productid=P.id WHERE C.ordered='false' AND C.userid=''
